summary: Successfully integrated the DotLottieReact component from @lottiefiles/dotlottie-react library to display the aboutus.lottie animation. Replaced the custom CSS construction animation with the proper Lottie animation component. The DotLottieReact component is specifically designed to handle .lottie files and should resolve the previous XMLHttpRequest errors. The animation is configured with loop and autoplay enabled, and styled to fill the container properly.
current_status: The About Us section now uses the DotLottieReact component to display the aboutus.lottie animation from the public folder. The component is properly configured with loop and autoplay, and styled to fit the container. This should resolve the previous loading issues and display the custom Lottie animation as intended.
